item.title: Cross-language interoperability with Java applications
Interoperate with gRPC applications
item.description: 1. Preparations dubbo-go cli tools and dependent tools have been installed Create a new demo application 2. Interoperability between Dubbo-go application and gRPC application Reference dubbo-go-samples/rpc/triple/pb/dubbogo-grpc
